strokes.description: Drawing a gentle curved smile beneath the colorful bubbles, complementing their playful arrangement

parsed_instruction.reasoning: The existing canvas shows a delightful array of overlapping translucent circles in soft, pastel colors, creating a dreamy, bubble-like effect. A whimsical mood feels perfect to complement these floating shapes. I'm choosing to add a simple, curved smile with the pen brush to transform these bubbles into a subtle, abstract happy face. The slow, deliberate speed (t=4) ensures smooth line quality that maintains the gentle, playful atmosphere without disrupting the ethereal quality of the existing circles. Using the pen brush provides a clean, precise line that contrasts nicely with the soft, overlapping circles while maintaining the light, cheerful spirit of the composition.
